long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display your technician's locations within the ServiceTrade maps!  FieldLogix provides vehicles locations within the same map as the ServiceTrade appointments.  With the ServiceTrade + FieldLogix Combined Map you can view both scheduled and unscheduled appointments along with the technician's locations to help you make rapid-fire dispatch decisions.
